articles.title: True or false: Women see more colours than men - The Indian Express
articles.description: Women See More Colours? Science Explains!  Explore the fascinating link between X chromosomes, cone cells, hormones, and brain structure that potentially gives women an edge in color perception compared to men.
articles.content: Neuroscientist and content creator Emily McDonald in her latest reel, says, Fun fact of the day is that women can often see more colours than men and this is because the genes that are responsible fo… [+3522 chars]
